name: Brown Butter Pumpkin Spice Espresso Chocolate Chunk Blondies
ingredients: ¾ cup chocolate chunks or chips
instructions: In a medium bowl, combine melted butter, granulated sugar, and brown sugar
Add pumpkin puree, eggs, and vanilla extract; mix until smooth
Stir together flour, baking powder, salt, and instant espresso in a separate bowl
Spread batter in a lined 8×8-inch pan
Bake 35–37 minutes, until set and golden
Cool completely, then cut into squares
